person.persName: Benjamin William Penick (Green County Home Guard)

body.p: A Kentucky livestock dealer and trader. Educated at Columbia High School and in the Greensburg area. Graduated from Georgetown College in 1860. Lived in Green County, Kentucky in 1861. Married twice, first to Elizabeth F. Brummal Penick and on a second occasion to Anna Mary Hobson Penick. Father of Brummal Penick, Mary Lewis Penick Lewis, Sylvan Hundly Penick, and William Clifton Penick. Served as a captain in the Green County Home Guard in 1861. Engaged in the business partnership of Ingram & Penick, with Isaac W. Ingram, in 1864 and 1865.
